title: Request to Change Academic Advisor
description: A student is requesting to be assigned a new academic advisor due to a personality conflict.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their currently assigned advisor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's current advisor.

tasks.description: Review the list of other available advisors in the student's academic department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds two other advisors with availability.

tasks.description: Reassign the student to a new advisor based on their preference or random assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the student's assigned advisor in the SIS.
